about.title: About me
about.presentation: Hey, my name is Corentin and I'm 20 years old.
about.study: Currently, I'm studying for a BSC. Computer Science at the <0>IU International University of Applied Sciences.</0>.
about.work: I'm also a freelance backend developer and I've been working on several projects for the past year including websites and web applications.
about.lang: My main programming language is <0>Golang</0> but I've also worked with java, python, typescript, C/C++ and more.
about.database: I also have experience with databases such as PostgreSQL or MongoDB and I'm familiar with Docker, Docker Compose and even Podman.
about.opensource: Furthermore, I'm a passionate open-source enthusiast and have been contributing to several projects for a few years now. I've also created <0>Memnix</0>, a free and open-source flashcard app for Android and Web.
about.community: I like to manage communities and I'm currently the founder of <0> The Kafejo </0> a Discord community for developers and students.
about.chess: You might also meet me on a chess board as I'm playing a lot and I'm managing a chess community for my friend <0>Stouuf</0> on Discord, Twitch and YouTube.
about.linux: I'm also a big fan of Linux and I've been using it since my youngest age. At the moment, I'm using <0>OpenSuse Tumbleweed</0> as my main operating system and <1>Void Linux</1> on my laptop.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.memnix: Memnix is a project that aims to create tools to facilitate learning for students by working in an organized way. It's using its own spaced repetition system to allows students to create and share their learning materials.
projects.gauntlet: Gauntlet reborn is a project that aims to create a new version of the arcade game Gauntlet from the 80s.
projects.uca_edt: A simple project to help UCA (Université Côte d'Azur) students to have a better view of their schedule and to be able to export it to their calendar.
projects.kitsu: Kitsu is a multi-purpose discord bot that generates stats for your discord server to help you increase the activity and grow quicker.
projects.stouuf: This is a website I made for Stouuf, a french chess coach. It's a simple single page website to help him promote his courses and find new students.
projects.echiquier_nicois: This is a website I made for my chess club.
